channel.title: MySQL DB Transfer
channel.description:
How can I upload my database to another forum.
I downloaded the database form the old forum now I need to upload it but how can I do it and does it matter if the database names are different? Is this even possible?
Cheers.

item.title: MySQL DB Transfer
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

Error

SQL query:

MySQL Quick Admin Database Backup

Backup made: October 12, 2007, 6:48 am

Database: javaownz_zendurl1

--------------------------------------------------------

Table structure for table ‘smf_attachments’

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS smf_attachments ;

MySQL said: Documentation
#1046 - No database selected

I get this error when importing it to new site.

Read full topic

item.title: MySQL DB Transfer
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“i–own–i, post:3, topic:151143”]Thanks for reply.

I do have the backup file. PMA=phpmyadmin?

I thought that would work but atm phpmyadmin is not working I will have to try tomorrow because the new website is brand new it hasn’t resolved or whatever yet.[/quote]It’s there a dump tab?

Read full topic

I do have the backup file. PMA=phpmyadmin?

item.title: MySQL DB Transfer
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

If you have the .sql file, you should be able to upload it using PMA (8mb max file size). If you can’t do that,
mysql --user=username --password=password < MyDatabaseBackup.sql

Read full topic
